projects.name: Pegasus AI
projects.description: Pegasus AI is a multilingual platform designed for businesses and shops looking to create custom support chatbots. These chatbots are trained using the LlamaIndex.ts framework with the Llama3 model, leveraging customer-provided documents to deliver tailored and effective customer interactions.
projects.technologies: NextJS, Typescript, ShadcnUI, Tailwind CSS, Aceternity UI
tasks: Integrating with backend APIs for CRUD operations
